descriptionHtml:
[*][center][/center]
[center]  
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75188-0-1461588606.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/46912?][u] Oblivion Version [/u]
Xenonomicon - A Collection of Peculiar Beings[/url][/center]

[b]0. Disclaimer[/b]

This is an older mod that was not released on the Nexus before. I have not worked on it for several years, nor have I played the game.
I cannot guarantee that it still works properly. However, I have seen it being used in screenshots every now and then so it does seem to work still.

Not only is this mod old, it was also never finished. Meaning that many features that you might expect from a custom race mod are missing. This includes skill bonuses, spells abilities and so on.

This mod is published "as is". Due to unfortunate circumstances I am unable to offer any kind of support.
Why release an old, unfinished mod? Because I remember people were looking forward to these races a long time ago, but never got the chance to try them.

[b]I. Description[/b]

Previously known as "Otherworldly Beings", Xenonomicon is a selection of custom races that were made in 2012 and 2013.
It includes the following races:

- Obscuuri (male and female)
- Gorgon (female)
- Rusalka (female)
- Dryad (female)
- Leshy (male)

[url=http://xenius.imgur.com/]More images can be found here[/url]

[b]II. Installation[/b]

> Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files
> Find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim
> Place the OwB.esp and OwB.bsa files in your Data folder

[b]III. Uninstallation[/b]

Remove OwB.esp and OwB.bsa from your Data folder.

[b]IV. Requirements[/b]

- RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard by TMPhoenix

[b]V. Recommendations[/b]

- RaceMenu by Expired

RaceMenu is not required to make the mod work properly. I do recommend installing it anyway; as it will allow you to pick any colour for both hair and skin. Without the menu, it would be hard to match the Gorgon's tentacle hair with the skin.

[b]VI. Credits[/b]

Thanks to Phygit for FemFeet
Thanks to dimon99 for Dimonized UNP Body
Thanks to Nouk for the original hairstyles
Thanks to zzjay for converting the hairstyles
Thanks to Apachii for ApachiiSkyHair
Thanks to Chris57 and FavoredSoul for Better Males
Thanks to expired6978 for race compatibility and race creation tutorial
Thanks to TMPhoenix for updated race compatibility
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim

[b]VII. Permissions[/b]

> You are allowed to use the contents of this mod for your own mod.
   If you do so, please notify me. You do not have to ask permission.
< You are not allowed to upload the contents of this mod outside of the Nexus.
< You are not allowed to convert my textures to other games.

VIII. Log

24-05-2013: Limited release on blog
25-04-2016: Published on Nexus
